Title: Vivek Darshan Singh | Personal Webpage
Name: Vivek Darshan Singh
Description: Final Year Undergraduate Student from NIT Silchar. Passionate about Data Science, Competitive Coding and Cosmology.
I grab every chance I to get travel, learn and explore.
AboutContent: I'm EIE major by day, sportsman by evening, a functional wantrepreneur by night and a hustler always
If you can’t find me, it’s because I’m already cycling, off to a hike, or studying for an exam.
I am passionate about Cosmology and Astrophysics (though, never studied them formally). A die-hard fan of Neil deGrasse Tyson.
I know the importance of working as a team and hence would love to work and travel together whenever I can.
WorkContent: I have primarily worked in the area of both Research and Development.
